structure.unit: ARTICLE X. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT IN UNINCORPORATED AREAS

law.catch_line: Display of local business tax receipt.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-227.5. Display of local business tax receipt.
The person obtaining the local business tax receipt shall keep the same displayed conspicuously at the place of business and in such a manner as to be open to the view of the public and subject to the inspection of all duly authorized officers of the County. Upon failure to do so, he shall be subject to the payment of another local business tax for engaging in or managing the business or occupation for which the receipt was obtained.
